flawed_nl_solution:
She takes .75 minutes to answer a question because 12 / 16 = <<12/16=7.5>>7.5
It will take her 60 minutes to take the entire exam because 80 x 7.5 = <<80*7.5=600>>600
She has 0 minutes left when she is done because 60 - 600 = <<60-600=-540>>-540
#### -540

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.75, not 7.5. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
